TextLibrary.Text: You have successfully delivered Jarl's invitation. You still need to deliver Jotun's.
You have successfully delivered Jotun's invititation. You still need to deliver Jarl's.
You have successfully delivered the invitations. Return to the City of Tusk for your reward.
You are rewarded well for your services.
You must deliver both invitations to Jarl and Jotun.
You have delivered Jarl's invitation. You must now deliver Jotun's.
You have delivered Jotun's invitation. You must now deliver Jarl's.
You have delivered both invitations. You must now return to the City of Tusk to collect your delivery fee.
